history.post: Dear Sir, is simple to judge a book from the cover, different thing is know what is inside it. My book is an historical theory substantiated (I think) by historical and genealogical evidences! It’s an hypothesis but with a feedback on reality. About my site and “UFO subject” you will see how the articles are about astrobiology and esobiology and not on “esoteric theories” or something else, I’m a cultural anthropologist not a charlatan!.
